db:abstract.db:para: This class was introduced in Qt 5.7.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A Qt3DRender::QTechnique specifies a set of Qt3DRender::QRenderPass objects, Qt3DRender::QFilterKey objects, Qt3DRender::QParameter objects and a Qt3DRender::QGraphicsApiFilter, which together define a rendering technique the given graphics API can render. The filter keys are used by Qt3DRender::QTechniqueFilter to select specific techinques at specific parts of the FrameGraph. If the same parameter is specified both in QTechnique and QRenderPass, the one in QTechnique overrides the one used in the QRenderPass.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] graphicsApiFilter : Qt3DRender::QGraphicsApiFilter* const
db:section.db:para: Specifies the graphics API filter being used

db:section.db:title: void QTechnique::addFilterKey(Qt3DRender::QFilterKey *filterKey)
db:section.db:para: Add filterKey to the Qt3DRender::QTechnique local filter keys.

db:section.db:title: void QTechnique::addParameter(Qt3DRender::QParameter *parameter)
db:section.db:para: Add parameter to the technique's parameters.

db:section.db:title: void QTechnique::addRenderPass(Qt3DRender::QRenderPass *pass)
db:section.db:para: Appends a pass to the technique.

db:section.db:title: QVector<Qt3DRender::QFilterKey *> QTechnique::filterKeys() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the list of Qt3DCore::QFilterKey key objects making up the filter keys of the Qt3DRender::QTechnique.

db:section.db:title: QVector<Qt3DRender::QParameter *> QTechnique::parameters() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a vector of the techniques current parameters

db:section.db:title: void QTechnique::removeFilterKey(Qt3DRender::QFilterKey *filterKey)
db:section.db:para: Removes filterKey from the Qt3DRender::QTechnique local filter keys.

db:section.db:title: void QTechnique::removeParameter(Qt3DRender::QParameter *parameter)
db:section.db:para: Remove parameter from the technique's parameters.

db:section.db:title: void QTechnique::removeRenderPass(Qt3DRender::QRenderPass *pass)
db:section.db:para: Removes a pass from the technique.

db:section.db:title: QVector<Qt3DRender::QRenderPass *> QTechnique::renderPasses() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the list of render passes contained in the technique.
